Constants

STANDARD_HELP = proc do |render_on,short,long,dash_short,dash_long,required_or_not,description,arity| render_on.printf(" #{ dash_short }%-10s (#{ required_or_not ? 'Required' : 'Optional' }, takes #{arity} argument#{ (arity==1) ? '' : 's' })\n",short)
